name: skyrider_sword

refinementEffect.refine_one: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
refinementEffect.refine_two: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 15% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
refinementEffect.refine_three: Using an Elemental Burst grants an 18% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
refinementEffect.refine_four: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 21% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
refinementEffect.refine_five: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
